Class JosmanProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.josman.JosmanProject

  • public class JosmanProject
extends Object
    Represents a Josman project, holding information about maven and git repository.
    Author:
    David Leoni

        snapshotMode - if true the website generator will only process the current branch snapshot. Otherwise all released versions except ignoredVersions will be processed,

    • Method Detail

      • isSnapshotMode

        public boolean isSnapshotMode()
        Returns true if the website generator will only process the current branch snapshot. Otherwise all released versions will be processed.
